General.Name: BMEX Gold Inc
General.Description: BMEX Gold Inc., a junior mineral exploration company, engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of gold and base metal properties in Canada. It holds an option to acquire 100% in the King Tut Gold property, comprising of 120 mineral claims that covers an area of 5,206 hectares located in Quebec, Canada; and Dunlop Bay Gold project, consisting of 76 mineral claims covering an area of 4,226 Hectares located in in Quebec, Canada. The company was formerly known as Meridius Resources Limited. BMEX Gold Inc. was incorporated in 2017 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 999 West Hastings Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 2W2
